Talk_New01_02_018:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>So, uh...how long do you plan to keep
running around like that?

It's not very professional, you know.
Talk_New01_03_002:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>I've been learning one thing after another
about the Depths lately. It's gotten me
super motivated!
I'll keep gathering <clr:0000>info about the
Depths <clr:ffff>so that I can be useful to
you, Swordsman.
Check back later, OK?
Talk_New01_01_018:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Oh, by the way. Do you know about the
Forest of Time south of Hyrule Field?

There's a chasm there—and I've gotten
reports of <clr:0000>another series of statues <clr:ffff>found
at the bottom of it.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>These statues are different from the one
you showed me using the <clr:0000>camera<clr:ffff>.

They seem to point the way somewhere,
too, and do come <clr:0000>near where you got
your Autobuild ability<clr:ffff>.
But they don't stop there. These statues
<clr:0000>lead farther southwest<clr:ffff> into the Depths!
Talk_New01_02_020:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We've discovered <clr:0000>another kind of statue<clr:ffff>,
different from those that went to the
southwest part of the Depths.
These are in Lanayru to the east. That
region has many chasms. You'll find these
statues at the bottom of two of them.
One is on land <clr:0000>in the Lanayru Wetlands<clr:ffff>.
The other is <clr:0000>north of Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>.

All of these statues have a strong
resemblance to the Zora.

<sp:3:0:2:0801>And these seem to lead <clr:0000>toward the east<clr:ffff>!
Talk_New01_02_019:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>So, uh... You're really into that
mask, huh?

Even as a joke, I don't like it much...
Talk_New01_03_003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Some investigators followed the stone
statues discovered at the bottom of
the chasms.
Talk_New01_01_020:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>It appears just like it was described in
the report!

<sp:3:0:2:0800>And of course you already found it—
you're amazing, Swordsman!
Talk_New01_02_021:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We've discovered <clr:0000>more statues<clr:ffff> in
Lanayru to the east!

That region has many chasms. You'll

of them.

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hi, Swordsman! Is there something you're

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Of the reports I've already received, I'm
focusing on...
Talk_New01_01_022:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You want me to check out
another picture?
Talk_New01_02_024:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>It resembles the Zora from the report to
a T!

<sp:3:0:2:0800>Seems like you've got more insight into
the Depths than even the survey team,
Swordsman. I should take notes!
Talk_New01_03_007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>A chasm was discovered on <clr:0000>the cliff face
at Rito Village<clr:ffff> in Hebra to the northwest.

I was thinking...maybe there's some kind
of connection between the surface and
the Depths.
So I want them to see whether or not it's
possible to go directly under the village
from there!
Talk_New01_01_024:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM>No way! <sp:5:1:0><clr:0000>Kohga<clr:ffff>, the leader of the Yiga
Clan, was there?!

Oooh, this is dangerous!


<sp:3:0:2:0700>I've gotta regain my composure... 


OK. Come this way.
Talk_New01_03_008:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>And after that, <sp:5:1:0>investigators continued to
follow those statues.
Talk_New01_01_025:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>So, you faced <clr:0000>Kohga<clr:ffff> in the Depths? Hmm,
what's the leader of the Yiga Clan up to
down there...
From what I know, the <clr:0000>Yiga Clan <clr:ffff>is a
super-dangerous group that schemes
against the kingdom of Hyrule.
And <clr:0000>Kohga<clr:ffff> has had it out for you and
<clr:0000>Princess Zelda <clr:ffff>for a long time. He'd do
anything to put an end to your lives.
Despite everything we're looking into
already, we just can't take our eyes off
this threat.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Besides, Kohga could know what's
happened to the princess. That would
make a lot of sense...
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you do go after him, keep in mind that
I'll be continuing my research of the
Depths from right here.
Talk_New01_03_009:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>The stone statues led to directly beneath
Zora's Domain, and they discovered
evidence of a civilization there!
When we dug a little deeper, we learned
that the statues in the southwest led
beneath Gerudo Town.
So I was thinking there may be a
connection between the surface and
the Depths.
So I tried investigating the chasms in
every region, to follow my hunch.

<sp:3:0:2:0800>And then we found a <clr:0000>new chasm<clr:ffff> on
<clr:0000>the cliff face at Rito Village<clr:ffff> in Hebra
to the northwest!
Next I'm thinking of having them check
whether it's possible to go directly under
the village from that point.
Talk_New01_03_010:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>We've collected a lot of info about
the Depths!

If you make any new discoveries, be sure
to let me know, Swordsman!
Talk_New01_01_026:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>There's been a discovery! There's a
<clr:0000>chasm<clr:ffff> in the Forest of Time south of
Hyrule Field.
And at the bottom of it, there's <clr:0000>another
series of statues<clr:ffff>.

These seem to point the way somewhere,
too, and do come <clr:0000>near where you got
your Autobuild ability<clr:ffff>.
But they don't stop there. These statues
<clr:0000>lead farther southwest <clr:ffff>into the Depths.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Where they go is anyone's guess, but I
bet there's a destination <clr:0000>far beyond that
building<clr:ffff> worth seeing.<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_New01_03_011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hm, this stone statue can be found
through a chasm in the Rito region, right?
Talk_New01_02_028: <sp:3:0:2:0c01>The chasms found in the east, hmmm.
Talk_New01_03_014:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hm, we were trying to follow these
statues ourselves.

But the road along the way was cut off,
so we couldn't make it any farther.

It seems impossible to follow these
statues at this point...

Which is why we're trying to get right
beneath the village through the chasm
in the wall we found!
Talk_New01_03_015:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You found a stone statue? Oh, please
show me!
Talk_New01_00_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Swordsman, welcome back!


Princess Zelda disappeared underground,
so there's a strong chance the Depths will
give us clues to what's happened to her.
I also suspect that important ruins are
hidden in the Depths, and I need to know
about them. So, my research continues!
<sp:3:0:2:0d01><snd:LaughS>If you make any new discoveries about
the Depths, let me know, OK?
Talk_New01_03_016:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This stone statue can be found through a
chasm in the Rito region.
Talk_New01_05_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Doc praised my work?!


Because of my research, you were able to
locate the Demon King...<sp:5:1:0> Really?<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_00>Wait...<sp:5:1:0> The...<sp:5:1:0>Demon King...<sp:5:1:0>


You mean, like...the Demon King?
Not just any ol' demon king but...<sp:5:1:0>
THE Demon King?<sp:5:1:0>
...<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Wow! <sp:5:1:0><clr:0000>The Demon King<clr:ffff>!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>


AHEM. Er, so...anyway.<sp:5:0:0> The Demon King
might hold the answer regarding
Princess Zelda's whereabouts... Hm...
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>Obviously I'm not allowed into the Depths
myself, being a kid and all. But I want to
continue to help out, even if I can't go.
I've really poured my heart into
researching the Depths...<sp:5:0:0> And all
that work really paid off.<sp:5:0:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I'm so happy I put my all into this!
Talk_New01_00_002:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'm certain that the Depths will give us
clues to what's happened to Princess
Zelda. So, my research continues...
<sp:3:0:2:0d01><snd:LaughS>Oh! And if you make any new discoveries
about the Depths, let me know, OK?
Talk_New01_04_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hi, Swordsman! Welcome back!


You look like you're in a good mood...


<sp:3:0:2:0801>Did you discover something, hmmm?
Talk_New01_05_002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Obviously the Demon King's a real
problem. But we've got a lead on
Princess Zelda from the Depths now.
I'm so glad my research was helpful to
you and Doc...

I feel like the Depths holds more value
for us.

<sp:3:0:2:0d00><snd:LaughS>So I'll keep it up with my research!

So did he have any clues about
Princess Zelda?!

<sp:3:0:2:0d00><snd:LaughS>So I'll be hard at work here on

Talk_New01_04_003:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Oh no... Nothing, huh...

I'm not even surprised you did all this—

Talk_New01_03_021: <sp:3:0:2:0c01>The chasm in the northwest, I think.

statues that seem to lead southwest.
Talk_New01_02_013:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM>Swordsman, what happened to your shirt?


Oh no! I bet it got all shredded up when
you battled the Yiga Clan, huh?

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I feel bad for asking you to take on such a
dangerous mission...

<sp:3:0:2:0801>But in brighter news, I have new info
about the Depths.

So listen to this! And don't be too sad
about your poor shirt...
